name: SAINT JOHN BOSCO EDUCATIONAL TRUST

address: No . 2 , St. John Bosco Educational Institutional Campus .
T . V Malai Road Institutional Campus , Kandachipuram .

briefDescription: St.John Bosco Educational Trust , Rged . 1990Vision :   To provide employment opportunities Educate and Train 5000 unemployed women and youths school  dropouts to become employable skill Trained by 2020.Mission : Through   ITIs  ,Polytechniques , open schooling , Teacher  Training  Institute , skill development centers , Government , NGOs to be the tools to Train .Main  Objectives of the Trust :•	To promote educationally backward rural woman and youths particularly the weaker section.•	To abolish caste , creed , race religious differences among the youths.•	To bring up understanding and co operation among youths of various region and language .•	To improve quality living condition , cleanliness in living places by improving better health and environment.•	To give awareness to the youths through education to respect each other religion  and caste.•	To establish educational Institutions , Training center skill development centers to become employable skill Trained.•	To give importance to women , house wives school dropout and the minorities to train to have self employment.•	To establish sports academic centers to train and participate in national and
